I am also seeing this on 20041216-1200.

Nick thinks there may be two disposes going on.
We have confirmed there are two disposes going on. Moving to Nick

Problem occurs because the delegate implements both IActionDelegate2 and
IWorkbenchWindowActionDelegate, both of which have dispose(), and the workbench
calls these at different times.

This is a workbench problem, but out of curiosity, has there been a recent
change in this area in CVS?  I'm wondering why we haven't seen this earlier.

Yes there has. I've enabled keybindings for all CVS actions (via
handlersubmisions) and have also added a CVS action set. CVS actions now
implement all of the Workbench's delegates and IHandler so that they can be used
everywhere!

Changing title to describe the real problem.
Fix released to HEAD.
*** Bug 81419 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 81443 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Filed bug 81442 to write a regression test for this.
Correction: Bug 81422 was filed to create a regression test for this.
